md.name: descriptive
md.value: <record xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim http://www.loc.gov/standards/marcxml/schema/MARC21slim.xsd"><leader>02452ntm a2200421 i 4500</leader><controlfield tag="001">001229853</controlfield><controlfield tag="003">CZ PrCU</controlfield><controlfield tag="005">20101015150142.0</controlfield><controlfield tag="008">170419s2009 xr r cze d</controlfield><datafield tag="040" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">ABD027</subfield><subfield code="b">cze</subfield><subfield code="e">rda</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="100" ind1="1" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Tichá, Michaela</subfield><subfield code="4">dis</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="245" ind1="1" ind2="0"><subfield code="a">Anti-aging jako podpora samostatnosti ve stáří /</subfield><subfield code="c">Michaela Tichá ; vedoucí práce Marie Vorlová ; oponent práce Martin Jelínek</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="246" ind1="3" ind2="3"><subfield code="a">Anti-Aging as the Support of Independence in the Old Age</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="300" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">[51 l.]</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="504" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Obsahuje bibliografii</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="500" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Datum obhajoby: 08-09-2009</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="502" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Bakalářská práce (Bc.)--Univerzita Karlova. Evangelická teologická fakulta, 2009</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="526" ind1="8" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Pastorační a sociální práce</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="526" ind1="8" ind2="1"><subfield code="a">Sociální práce</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">This bachelor thesis titled Anti-Aging as the Support of Independence in the Old Age covers the topic of population aging, which nowadays becomes particularly topical. The work describes the position of the Czech Republic on this problem and what measures are being prepared to overcome issues related to this topic. The thesis builds on the document "Národní plán přípravy na stárnutí na období let 2008 až 2012" (The National Aging Preparation Plan for 2008 to 2012) prepared by the Czech government and on a new medical field known as the anti-aging medicine. The author attempts to compare both attitudes to population aging and to draw conclusions that might lead to a solution of these issues to which the current society is being exposed. Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)</subfield><subfield code="b">Full text of the abstract is available in the Thesis Repository of CU</subfield><subfield code="8">eng</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="586" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Výsledné hodnocení: Uspokojivě</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">stáří</subfield><subfield code="7">ph126204</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">stárnutí</subfield><subfield code="7">ph126175</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">stárnutí obyvatelstva</subfield><subfield code="7">ph137522</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="650" ind1="0" ind2="7"><subfield code="a">anti-aging medicína</subfield><subfield code="7">ph471354</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="655" ind1=" " ind2="7"><subfield code="a">bakalářské práce</subfield><subfield code="7">fd132403</subfield><subfield code="2">czenas</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="700" ind1="1" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Vorlová, Marie</subfield><subfield code="7">uk2009335091</subfield><subfield code="4">ths</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="710" ind1="2" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Univerzita Karlova.</subfield><subfield code="b">Evangelická teologická fakulta</subfield><subfield code="7">kn20010710335</subfield><subfield code="4">dgg</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="710" ind1="2" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Jabok - Vyšší odborná škola sociálně pedagogická a teologická</subfield><subfield code="7">kn20020502016</subfield><subfield code="4">edt</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="850" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">ETF</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="856" ind1="4" ind2="1"><subfield code="u">https://is.cuni.cz/webapps/zzp/detail/81748</subfield><subfield code="y">Zobrazení plného textu (Repozitář závěrečných prací UK)</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="264" ind1=" " ind2="0"><subfield code="c">2009</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="336" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">text</subfield><subfield code="b">txt</subfield><subfield code="2">rdacontent</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="337" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">počítač</subfield><subfield code="b">c</subfield><subfield code="2">rdamedia</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="338" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">online zdroj</subfield><subfield code="b">cr</subfield><subfield code="2">rdacarrier</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="997" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">DS</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="988" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">ER</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="998" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">001229853</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="SID" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">Z39</subfield><subfield code="b">CKS01</subfield></datafield><controlfield tag="FMT">BK</controlfield></record>
